title: Digital Strategy
description: Achieving a time and cost-efficient service, and a technology-forward service.

title: Housing Delivery Tracker
description: A monitoring tool designed to track development progress timelines within the borough.

title: Housing Monitoring Live
description: Providing real-time updates and monitoring of housing development progress.

title: Stalled Sites Tracker
description: A interactive map for all the stalled sites in LBTH until Jan 2025.

title: Committee Sites Tracker
description: An interactive map for committee sites between Nov 2024 to Jan 2025 in LBTH.

title: Brownfield Land Register
description: An interactive map for all the Brownfield Land Register in LBTH.
